recommendations: Adhiraj Dey ‚ÄúI have known Priya since My visit to IIT Kharagpur, when I had gone there for lectures and among all the crowds of MHRM Priya was one of outstanding student in Human Resources Management, my interaction with Priya was always interesting and educating. Priya's strengths are: HR Analytics, HR Strategy, Project Management, OB/OD, Communication, Problem Solving. She also has a keen eye on Learning and Development Subject. I am wishing Priya all success in her future endeavours. It's my strong understanding that any Organization Priya Joins, she will be an asset to that Organization.‚Äù

Roneet Mohanty ‚ÄúI got the opportunity to manage Priya during her internship at YES Bank. She is a fast learner and goes that extra mile to learn and implement new concepts. She is process oriented in her approach as well and has a keen interest to understand the 360-degree view of things. She has a strong technical background and combine that with the functional expertise of human resource management, that makes a strong combination for many pivotal data-driven HR roles.‚Äù
